fields.name: AutoGeneratedDomainNameLabelScope
fields.description: The value representing the security enum. The 'Unsecure' value is the default value if not selected and means the object's domain name label is not secured against subdomain takeover. The 'TenantReuse' value is the default value if selected and means the object's domain name label can be reused within the same tenant. The 'SubscriptionReuse' value means the object's domain name label can be reused within the same subscription. The 'ResourceGroupReuse' value means the object's domain name label can be reused within the same resource group. The 'NoReuse' value means the object's domain name label cannot be reused within the same resource group, subscription, or tenant.

fields.name: DnsNameLabel
fields.description: The Dns name label for the IP.

fields.name: IP
fields.description: The IP exposed to the public internet.

fields.name: Ports
fields.description: The list of ports exposed on the container group.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Specifies if the IP is exposed to the public internet or private VNET.
